content: Write a children's song where each verse focuses on a different letter of the alphabet.

(Verse A)
A is for apple, red and round,
Bouncing on the ground.
B is for bee, buzzing by,
Collecting honey sky-high.

(Chorus)
Alphabet song, letters so fun,
From A to Z, we're just begun.
Learning together, hand in hand,
字母之歌，字母真有趣，
从A到Z，我们才刚开始。
一起学习，手牵手，

(Verse C)
C is for cat, wearing a hat,
Dancing in the sun, having a chat.
D is for dog, wagging its tail,
Playing fetch, never getting stale.

(Chorus)
Alphabet song, letters so fun,
From A to Z, we're just begun.
Learning together, hand in hand,
字母之歌，字母真有趣，
从A到Z，我们才刚开始。
一起学习，手牵手，

(Verse E)
E is for elephant, big and gray,
Swinging its trunk, come what may.
F is for frog, jumping in the pond,
Singing songs, all day long.

(Chorus)
Alphabet song, letters so fun,
From A to Z, we're just begun.
Learning together, hand in hand,
字母之歌，字母真有趣，
从A到Z，我们才刚开始。
一起学习，手牵手，

(Verse G)
G is for giraffe, tall and slim,
Reaching for leaves, in the sun's warm dim.
H is for horse, galloping free,
Across the meadow, wild and carefree.

(Chorus)
Alphabet song, letters so fun,
From A to Z, we're just begun.
Learning together, hand in hand,
字母之歌，字母真有趣，
从A到Z，我们才刚开始。
一起学习，手牵手，

(Verse I)
I is for igloo, built with snow,
Where polar bears can play and go.
J is for jellyfish, floating so light,
In the ocean's depth, day and night.

(Chorus)
Alphabet song, letters so fun,
From A to Z, we're just begun.
Learning together, hand in hand,
字母之歌，字母真有趣，
从A到Z，我们才刚开始。
一起学习，手牵手，

(Verse K)
K is for kite, flying high,
With the wind, touching the sky.
L is for lion, king of the jungle,
Roaring loud, in itsungle.

(Chorus)
Alphabet song, letters so fun,
From A to Z, we're just begun.
Learning together, hand in hand,
字母之歌，字母真有趣，
从A到Z，我们才刚开始。
一起学习，手牵手，

(Verse M)
M is for monkey, swinging from tree,
Chattering away, carefree and free.
N is for nest, built by the bird,
Holding eggs, safe and absurd.

(Chorus)
Alphabet song, letters so fun,
From A to Z, we're just begun.
Learning together, hand in hand,
字母之歌，字母真有趣，
从A到Z，我们才刚开始。
一起学习，手牵手，

(Verse O)
O is for octopus, with arms so wide,
Exploring the ocean, side by side.
P is for panda, black and white,
Eating bamboo, day and night.

(Chorus)
Alphabet song, letters so fun,
From A to Z, we're just begun.
Learning together, hand in hand,
字母之歌，字母真有趣，
从A到Z，我们才刚开始。
一起学习，手牵手，

(Verse Q)
Q is for quilt, warm and snuggly,
Keeping you cozy, through the chilly.
R is for rabbit, hopping around,
Eating carrots, on the ground.

(Chorus)
Alphabet song, letters so fun,
From A to Z, we're just begun.
Learning together, hand in hand,
字母之歌，字母真有趣，
从A到Z，我们才刚开始。
一起学习，手牵手，

(Verse S)
S is for star, shining bright,
In the night sky, a wondrous sight.
T is for tiger, stripes so bold,
Roaming the forests, young and old.

(Chorus)
Alphabet song, letters so fun,
From A to Z, we're just begun.
Learning together, hand in hand,
字母之歌，字母真有趣，
从A到Z，我们才刚开始。
一起学习，手牵手，

(Verse U)
U is for umbrella, keeping you dry,
Under the rain, up in the sky.
V is for violin, making sweet sounds,
Playing music, all around.

(Chorus)
Alphabet song, letters so fun,
From A to Z, we're just begun.
Learning together, hand in hand,
字母之歌，字母真有趣，
从A到Z，我们才刚开始。
一起学习，手牵手，

(Verse W)
W is for whale, swimming so slow,
Through the deep sea, where waves ebb and flow.
X is for xylophone, making music play,
Tapping the keys, in a joyful way.

(Chorus)
Alphabet song, letters so fun,
From A to Z, we're just begun.
Learning together, hand in hand,
字母之歌，字母真有趣，
从A到Z，我们才刚开始。
一起学习，手牵手，

(Verse Y)
Y is for yarn, soft and bright,
Knitting and crocheting, day and night.
Z is for zebra, black and white,
Striking stripes, in the moonlight.

(Chorus)
Alphabet song, letters so fun,
From A to Z, we've come to an end.
Learning together, till the very end,
字母之歌，字母真有趣，
从A到Z，我们来到了终点。
一起学习，直到最后一刻，

(Outro)
Now we've reached Z, what a ride,
Learning the alphabet, side by side.
So keep on singing, this song so sweet,
As we continue to learn and repeat.

(Outro)
现在我们到达了Z，这真是一次奇妙的旅程，
一起学习字母，肩并肩。
所以继续唱着这首歌，如此甜美，
因为我们将继续学习和重复。

(End)
